Paper.Title: SemTAG, the LORIA toolbox for TAG-based Parsing and Generation

Section.Paragraph: In this paper, we introduce SEMTAG, a toolbox for TAG-based parsing and generation. This environment supports the development of wide-coverage grammars and differs from existing environments for TAG such as XTAG, (XTAG-Research-Group, 2001) in that it includes a semantic dimension. SEMTAG is open-source and freely available.
